name: notification-agent
description: Multi-channel notification agent — routes alerts to email, Slack, SMS, or webhooks based on rules
docs: Routes notifications to the appropriate channel based on urgency and type. Requires: email-tool (RESEND_API_KEY), slack-tool (SLACK_BOT_TOKEN), sms-tool (TWILIO_* vars), webhook-tool (no keys). Not all tools are required — the agent adapts to available channels.
